entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1200 metres. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
